::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod flaps his wings, soring through the air. Following Striker to
the ARK. He looks around, and he thanks.

Despite all the damage caused to this planet by Transformers, it is a
beutiful world. The mountins, forests, and waters. These wars must stop
soon.
